column4: i have a problem: i was trying to install GDM themes after installing i logged out and back in. now it will not load the login screen. is there a way to get on and change the setting back???
what did you do to install it?
i went into sys/admin/login window and installed the theme that i downloaded
i can get into terminal using ctrl+alt-f1 but i dont know many commands to get back into the GUI
